TwoSpirals Datset

Error value, more or less, stays the same during the iterations which implies that the data is not separable.

Execution of one of the folds of the training data:
Step number:  1
Error:  750.0
Step number:  101
Error:  740.0
Step number:  201
Error:  764.0
Step number:  301
Error:  796.0
Step number:  401
Error:  780.0

Error:  764.0
Step number:  601
Error:  736.0
Step number:  701
Error:  756.0
Step number:  801
Error:  760.0
Step number:  901
Error:  764.0
Step number:  1001
Error:  776.0


The accuracy, precision and recall values below indicate that data is not separable using Dual Perceptron with linear kernel.
